messages.title: WE'RE CHOOSING A GOVERNMENT!
messages.content: The Conservatives have bold plans to change the country for the better.

messages.title: Setting the Record Straight...
messages.content: Repeated claims by the Lib Dems that Jonathan Lord tried to be an MP elsewhere have seriously rebounded on them!

messages.title: JONATHAN - by Humphrey
messages.content: Jonathan knows Woking and our villages like the back of his hand. He has lived in Woking for many years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More urgent than any other issue.
By encouraging businesses to take on more workers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Make Britain the Most Family-Friendly Country
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By taking the toughest line of all parties on immigration, enhancing maternity and paternity leave, and tackling anti-social behaviour.
By giving our schools more freedom and by increasing discipline, standards and choice.
By shaking up Westminster with a smaller House of Commons and cutting ministerial salaries.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race only the Conservatives can overtake Labour. Only your Conservative candidate Jonathan can win here.

issues.health: Jonathan is a champion for our local NHS
issues.immigration: Taking the toughest line of all parties on immigration

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonathan Lord is passionate about Woking and our villages. Jonathan has always lived in and around Surrey.

politicalExperience.role: Local Councillor and a local school governor

endorsements.endorser: Humphrey Mallins CBE, former MP for Woking
endorsements.endorsement: Jonathan knows Woking and our villages like the back of his hand. He has lived in Woking for many years.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet tries to refute claims made by the Lib Dems against Jonathan Lord.
